title: About The Ember Spoon
subtitle: Our Story & Philosophy
description: Founded in 2022, The Ember Spoon was born from a passion for celebrating South Africa’s rich culinary heritage in a modern, welcoming setting. Our team is dedicated to sourcing the freshest local ingredients and reimagining traditional recipes with creativity and care. Whether you’re a lifelong local or a first-time visitor, we invite you to experience the warmth, flavors, and hospitality that make our restaurant unique.

team.name: Chef Lindiwe Mokoena
team.bio: With over 15 years of experience, Chef Lindiwe brings a contemporary flair to classic South African dishes, blending innovation with tradition.

team.name: Sipho Dlamini
team.bio: Sipho’s commitment to exceptional service ensures every guest feels at home from the moment they arrive.
